title: Add INOVICS corporate presentation deck (.pptx) as a repository asset

requirements.summary: Generate the INOVICS corporate presentation deck as a 12–14 slide PPTX (target 14) matching the specified dark navy + yellow enterprise theme, and commit it into the repository for download via the Files panel.
acceptanceCriteria: A .pptx file for the INOVICS deck exists in the project repository (committed as a binary asset) and is visible/downloadable from the Files panel.
The PPTX opens successfully in PowerPoint/Google Slides without layout breakage or missing fonts/assets.
The deck contains 12–14 slides (target 14) and uses the exact slide-by-slide content from the prior conversation.
Visual style matches the specified dark navy + yellow accent theme, with bold headings, minimal bullets, and abstract data/grid visuals; no stock/cheesy imagery or heavy iconography is used.

file_operations.description: Add the final generated INOVICS corporate presentation deck as a committed binary PPTX asset in the repository (no external links). Ensure the deck uses the exact previously-provided slide-by-slide content, stays within 12–14 slides (target 14), and follows the specified visual styling (dark navy background similar to #0D1B2A, yellow accent in the #FFC300 range, clean enterprise look, bold typography, minimal bullets, abstract data/grid visuals, and no stock/cheesy imagery or heavy icons).
